description:
Add a little insurance to your travel plans with the up-for-anything Vidda Pro Trousers. The fabric is tough enough to stand up to the elements or let you scramble up a tree for a better view. Articulated knees follow your movements, letting you hit the local trails straight from the airport. Adjustable cuffs help you get the fit just right, making it easy to stay comfortable through long layovers and multi-day adventures.

  • Constructed from hardwearing, water-resistant G-1000® fabric with stretch panels
  • Plenty of pocket space for your EDC needs
  • Reinforced knees have openings to add (optional) knee pads
  • Generous hip-to-knee ventilation zippers
  • Knife pocket on the right legaxe loop at waist
  • Stretch fabric gussets for full range of movement
  • Straps at hem allow length adjustment
  • Regular length
name: Fjallraven Vidda Pro Ventilated Trousers - Men's
